ValidationRule.description: Prevents adding of members to inactive campaigns
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( OR( $Profile.Id = "00eE000000126tW", /* Frontier Auditor */ $Profile.Id = "00e40000000nYck", /* Frontier System Administrator */ $Profile.Id = "00e40000000nTsD", /* System Administrator */ $Profile.Id = "00eE000000124Kn" /* System Analyst */ ) ), AND ( ISNEW(), NOT(Campaign.IsActive) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Members cannot be added to inactive campaigns. Please select an active campaign.
